model.painting

Class FixedColorDecoratorPaintStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.painting.APaintStrategy
      • model.painting.ADecoratorPaintStrategy
        • model.painting.FixedColorDecoratorPaintStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPaintStrategy

    public class FixedColorDecoratorPaintStrategy
extends ADecoratorPaintStrategy
    Decorator paint strategy that decorates another IPaintStrategy and causes the painted color to always be a specified, fixed color. Useful when you want a shape that is a specific color and not the color of the host Ball.
    Author:
    caojian

    • Method Detail

      • paintXfrm

        public void paintXfrm(java.awt.Graphics g,
                      Ball host,
                      java.awt.geom.AffineTransform at)
        Description copied from class: APaintStrategy
        A secondary paint operation that uses a supplied affine transform. This allows the same affine transform to be shared amongst paint strategies, reducing the number of times that it has to be calculated.
        Specified by:
        paintXfrm in class APaintStrategy
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics to paint
        host - The ball
        at - The affine transform object
